validation.email.message: {value} must be a valid email address

validation.phone.message: {value} must be a valid phone number

validation.min.message: {value} must be at least {param} characters long

validation.max.message: {value} must be at most {param} characters long

validation.gte.message: {value} must be greater than or equal to {param}

validation.lte.message: {value} must be less than or equal to {param}

validation.alphaspace.message: {value} must contain only letters and spaces

validation.slug.message: {value} must be a valid slug (lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens)

validation.strong_password.message: {value} must be at least 8 characters and contain 3 of: uppercase, lowercase, numbers, special characters

validation.bsonid.message: {value} must be a valid BSON ID

validation.gtefield.message: {value} must be greater than or equal to {param}

validation.ltefield.message: {value} must be less than or equal to {param}

validation.json.message: {value} must be a valid JSON string
